item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, November 23, 2024 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. The tech utopia fantasy is over (75 points | 26 comments)
2. Highest-resolution images ever captured of the sun’s entire surface (243 points | 85 comments)
3. Size and albedo of the largest detected Oort-cloud object (34 points | 13 comments)
4. Mercedes spends $8bn/year on R&D (46 points | 34 comments)

6. Using GPS in the Year 1565 (91 points | 12 comments)
7. OpenMPTCProuter: Aggregate and encrypt multiple internet connections using MPTCP (106 points | 24 comments)

10. School did nothing wrong when it punished student for using AI, court rules (40 points | 38 comments)

23. Oncall shift should be Tuesday to Tuesday (136 points | 122 comments)

26. Oxford accused of relying on young academics employed on gig-economy terms (100 points | 62 comments)
27. RGFW: Single-header C99 window abstraction library (139 points | 82 comments)
28. Scientists Clone Two Black-Footed Ferrets from Frozen Tissues (64 points | 11 comments)
29. An Analysis of the Performance of WebSockets in Various Programming Languages (2021) (78 points | 38 comments)
